001import java.io.*;
002import java.util.List;
003import java.util.Stack;
004
005/**
006 *  This class is part of the "World of Zuul" application.
007 *  "World of Zuul" is a very simple, text based adventure game.
008 *
009 *  This class creates all rooms, creates the parser and starts
010 *  the game.  It also evaluates and executes the commands that
011 *  the parser returns.
012 *
013 * @author  Michael Kolling and David J. Barnes
014 * @version 1.0 (Jan 2003) DB edited (2019)
015 */
016public class GameEngine
017{
018    private Parser        aParser;
019    private UserInterface aGui;
020
021    private Player aCurrentPlayer;
022
023    /**
024     * Constructor for objects of class GameEngine
025     */
026    public GameEngine()
027    {
028        this.aParser = new Parser();
029        this.createRooms();
030    }
031
032    public void setGUI( final UserInterface pUserInterface )
033    {
034        this.aGui = pUserInterface;
035        this.printWelcome();
036    }
037
038    /**
039     * procédure affichant le message au marriage du jeu
040     */
041    private void printWelcome() {
042        this.aGui.println("Welcome to the World of Zuul!\nYour goal: solve puzzles.\nType 'help' if you need help.\n\n");
043        this.printLocationInfo();
044    }
045
046    /**
047     * procédure affichant la room actualle ansi que toutes les sorties disponibles
048     */
049    private void printLocationInfo() {
050        this.aGui.println(this.aCurrentPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription());
051        if (this.aCurrentPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() != null) {
052            this.aGui.showImage(this.aCurrentPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName());
053        }
054    }
055
056    /**
057     * Procédure pour créer toutes les rooms
058     */
059    private void createRooms() {
060        Room main = new Room("Main Room", "images/mainImage.png");
061        main.getItemList().addItem(new Item("test", "1er item test", 2));
062        main.getItemList().addItem(new Item("arme", "une arme", 17));
063
064        Room prehistoric = new Room("Prehistoric", "images/prehistoricImage.png");
065        prehistoric.getItemList().addItem(new MagicCookie());
066
067        Room moyenAge = new Room("Moyen Age", "images/moyenAgeImage.png");
068        Room antiquity = new Room("Antiquity", "images/antiquityImage.png");
069        Room egypte = new Room("Egypte", "images/egypteImage.png");
070        Room romaine = new Room("Romaine", "images/romanImage.png");
071        Room grece = new Room("Grece", "images/greceImage.png");
072        Room maya = new Room("Maya", "images/mayaImage.png");
073        Room china = new Room("China", "images/chinaImage.png");
074
075        main.setExit("north", moyenAge);
076        main.setExit("south", maya);
077        main.setExit("east", egypte);
078        main.setExit("west", prehistoric);
079        main.setExit("up", china);
080
081        prehistoric.setExit("east", main);
082
083        moyenAge.setExit("south", main);
084        moyenAge.setExit("east", antiquity);
085
086        antiquity.setExit("south", egypte);
087
088        egypte.setExit("west", main);
089        egypte.setExit("north", antiquity);
090        egypte.setExit("south", grece);
091
092        grece.setExit("north", egypte);
093        grece.setExit("west", romaine);
094
095        romaine.setExit("east", grece);
096
097        maya.setExit("north", main);
098
099        china.setExit("down", main);
100
101        this.aCurrentPlayer = new Player("Joueur 1", main, 18);
102    }
103
104    /**
105     * Given a command, process (that is: execute) the command.
106     * If this command ends the game, true is returned, otherwise false is
107     * returned.
108     */
109    public void interpretCommand( final String pCommandLine ) {
110        this.aGui.println( "> " + pCommandLine );
111        Command vCommand = this.aParser.getCommand( pCommandLine );
112
113        if ( vCommand.isUnknown() ) {
114            this.aGui.println( "I don't know what you mean..." );
115            return;
116        }
117
118        switch (vCommand.getCommandWord()) {
119            case "help" -> this.printHelp();
120            case "go" -> this.goRoom(vCommand);
121            case "quit" -> {
122                if ( vCommand.hasSecondWord() ) {
123                    this.aGui.println( "Quit what?" );
124                } else {
125                    this.endGame();
126                }
127            }
128            case "look" -> this.look(vCommand);
129            case "eat" -> this.eat(vCommand);
130            case "back" -> this.back(vCommand);
131            case "test" -> this.test(vCommand);
132            case "take" -> {
133                if (!vCommand.hasSecondWord()) {
134                    this.aGui.println("Take what?");
135                } else {
136                    if (this.aCurrentPlayer.take(vCommand.getSecondWord())) {
137                        this.printLocationInfo();
138                    } else {
139                        this.aGui.println("Vous ne pouvez pas prendre cet item");
140                    }
141                }
142            }
143            case "drop" -> {
144                if (!vCommand.hasSecondWord()) {
145                    this.aGui.println("Drop what?");
146                } else {
147                    if (this.aCurrentPlayer.drop(vCommand.getSecondWord())) {
148                        this.printLocationInfo();
149                    } else {
150                        this.aGui.println("Vous ne possédez pas cet item");
151                    }
152                }
153            }
154            case "inventory" -> this.inventory();
155            default -> this.aGui.println("I don't know what you mean...");
156        }
157    }
158
159
160    // implementations of user commands:
161
162    /**
163     * procédure affichant l'aide
164     */
165    private void printHelp() {
166        this.aGui.println("\nYou are lost. You are alone.\n\nYour command words are:");
167        this.aGui.println(aParser.getCommandString());
168    }
169
170    /**
171     * Procédure permettant d'aller dans la salle souhaiter
172     * après l'execution de la commande {@code go <nom de la salle>}
173     * @param pCommand
174     */
175    private void goRoom(final Command pCommand) {
176        if (!pCommand.hasSecondWord()) {
177            this.aGui.println("Go where ?");
178            return;
179        }
180
181        if (this.aCurrentPlayer.goRoom(pCommand.getSecondWord())) {
182            this.printLocationInfo();
183        } else {
184            this.aGui.println("There is no door !");
185        }
186    }
187
188    /**
189     * procédure affichant la room actualle ansi que toutes les sorties disponibles
190     */
191    private void look(Command pCommand) {
192        if (pCommand.hasSecondWord()) {
193            Item actualItem = this.aCurrentPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getItemList().getItemByName(pCommand.getSecondWord());
194            if (actualItem != null) {
195                this.aGui.println(actualItem.getLongDescription());
196                return;
197            }
198
199            this.aGui.println("I don't know how to look at something in particular yet.");
200            return;
201        }
202
203        this.aGui.println(this.aCurrentPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription());
204    }
205
206    private void eat(final Command pCommand) {
207        if (!pCommand.hasSecondWord()) {
208            this.aGui.println("Eat what ?");
209            return;
210        }
211
212        Item item = this.aCurrentPlayer.getItemList().getItemByName(pCommand.getSecondWord());
213        if (item == null) {
214            this.aGui.println("Vous ne possédez pas cet item.");
215            return;
216        }
217
218        this.aCurrentPlayer.use(item);
219        this.aGui.println("Vous venez de manger cette item");
220    }
221
222    private void back(final Command pCommand) {
223        if (pCommand.hasSecondWord()) {
224            this.aGui.println("Cette commande n'accept pas de second paramètre");
225            return;
226        }
227
228        if (this.aCurrentPlayer.back()) {
229            this.printLocationInfo();
230        } else {
231            this.aGui.println("Vous ne pouvez plus revenir en arrière");
232        }
233    }
234
235    private void test(final Command pCommand) {
236        if (!pCommand.hasSecondWord()) {
237            this.aGui.println("Quel fichier ?");
238            return;
239        }
240
241        File file = new File(pCommand.getSecondWord() + ".txt");
242        try (BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(new FileInputStream(file)))) {
243            String line;
244            while ((line = br.readLine()) != null) {
245                this.interpretCommand(line);
246            }
247        } catch (FileNotFoundException e) {
248            
249        } catch (IOException e) {
250            throw new RuntimeException(e);
251        }
252    }
253
254    private void inventory() {
255        this.aGui.println("Inventaire: ");
256        this.aGui.println(this.aCurrentPlayer.getItemList().getItemString());
257    }
258
259    private void endGame()
260    {
261        this.aGui.println( "Thank you for playing.  Good bye." );
262        this.aGui.enable( false );
263    }
264
265}
